cause.description:
Young Hadassah International (YHI) is part of a worldwide movement to raise awareness for the Hadassah Medical Centre, a leading hospital in the Middle East whose innovative medical research and exceptional patient care benefits individuals locally and around the world. With the goal of generating long term support among young adults, the men and women who comprise YHI organise fundraising events and promote networking among likeminded people. YHI chapters include Argentina, France, Germany, Israel, Italy, The Netherlands and the United Kingdom. To learn more visit www.young-hadassah.org.
1. promoting peace between people through health and medicine
2. stimulate scientific and medical development
3. Health care is a universal right
4. promotion of health and mutual respect
cause.mission: Building Bridges to Peace Through Medicine
